Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Defines certain terms in standard form contracts as unconscionable
Summary: Defines certain terms in standard form contracts as unconscionable.
LawCode: Add ยง349-g, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to unconscionable terms in standard form contracts
